phHappyAutumn.bodyCopy:
Earn your Golden Acorn badge by finding all 12 golden acorns! The Minister's hidden the acorns in each of the autumn meadows:

- Maple Tree Hill
- Cottonpuff Field
- Acorn Summit
- Pumpkin Patch

Hint: There are 3 golden acorns in each meadow! Happy hunting!

phTrickOrTreat.bodyCopy:
1. Buy a Trick or Treat Basket at Cassie's Costume Shop.
2. Fly up to a jack-o'-lantern while holding the basket.
3. Type "Trick or Treat" into chat or pick the phrase from the SpeedChat menu.
4. Get one prize per pumpkin!
5. Visit all 12 jack-o'-lanterns to collect all 12 prizes and a special badge!

Need a Trick or Treat Basket? Click "Go!" to fly to Cassie's and buy one!

phNatureSisters.bodyCopy:
- Make a Fairy friend.
- Both of you wear a Sparkly Wings Necklace (found in the Ballroom or for sale at the Pixie Post Office)!
- Both of you use the Sparkly Wings Emote at the same time!
- Earn your Sparkling Sister badge!

Click "Go!" to fly to the Pixie Post Office and buy the Sparkly Wings Necklace!

phSisterCelebration.bodyCopy:
It's a party for Tinker Bell's sister Periwinkle!

- Go on Tink's quest to earn your Chilly Traveler badge!
- With the badge, you'll be able to fly to Frosted Forest from Evergreen Overlook!
- Check the Calendar for Tink and Peri visits!
- Shop for Secret of the Wings styles, home items, and seeds!

phWinterChecklist.bodyCopy:
Be sure to check these activities off your list:
- Throw a friendly snowball in the Ballroom!
- Go on Silvermist's Quest to get the key to the Ice Palace!
- Enter the Ice Palace through Chilly Falls!
- Cook up holiday treats in Fairy Tale Theater!
- Shop for wintry wear, home items, seeds, and dyes!

phMinisterOfWinter.bodyCopy:
Welcome to my Ice Palace! Here's how to earn your 2012 Winter Wonderland badge:
- Gather 3 pixies.
- Everybody wear the Weasel Knit Hat!
- Everybody use the Whistle Emote at the same time!
- Earn the badge, and watch out for that weasel. . .

Need a Weasel Knit Hat? Click "Go!" to fly to the Ballroom and pick it up!

phGreatWinterLightUp.bodyCopy:
Have you always wanted to be a Frost Fairy? Me too!

Guess what! Ok, I'll tell you: The Frost Fairies have come up with way for us to help them make snowflakes for winter!

Fly to me in Dewdrop Vale to go on my Snowflakes Quest and earn your 2012 Ice Palace Key!!!

phGamesPrep.titleCopy:
Official Roster for
the Pixie Hollow Games
phGamesPrep.bodyCopy:
Team Animal: Fawn and Buck
Team Tinker: Tinker Bell and Fairy Mary
Team Water: Silvermist and Marina
Team Garden: Chloe and Rosetta
Team Light: Iridessa and Lumina
Team Fast-Flying: Vidia and Zephyr
Team Dust Keeper: Terrence and Fairy Gary
Team Storm: Rumble and Glimmer

Watch the Pixie Hollow Games live on the mainland!

winterWonderland.titleCopy:
A Note from the
Minister of Winter
winterWonderland.bodyCopy:
How to Make Snow:

1. Gather 10 pixies in the Ice Palace.

2. Use the Snowflake emote at the same time.

3. Enjoy the lovely winter snow!

winterWonderlandChecklist.titleCopy:
What to do at the
Winter Wonderland Party:
winterWonderlandChecklist.bodyCopy:
- Get a key to the Ice Palace from Silvermist's quest!

- Collect all four frosty friends in the Ice Palace!

- Make snow fall in the Ice Palace!

- Use your Talent Skills to make the Ice Palace come alive!

- Send a gift to your pixie pals at the Gift Wrapping Station!

- Have a snowball fight and get a free Snowman Silly Sweet in the Ballroom!

- Spread winter cheer in the frosty winter meadows!

fairyFriendshipFestival.bodyCopy:
How to earn your 2013 Fairy Friendship Festival badge:

1. Pick up the Heart Accessory Set in the Ballroom.

2. Gather 3 pixies.

3. Everybody wear Heart Accessory Set.

4. Everybody use the Heart emote at the same time.

5. Voila!

springEquinox.bodyCopy:
Calling all Fairies - Find all 10 golden clovers to earn the 2013 Golden Clover badge!

Hint: There are two clovers hidden in each of the Spring Meadows. When you spot one, click on it!

Good luck - and Happy Spring!

neverDoveEggHunt.bodyCopy:
Fly to Havendish Square to find all 15 Never Dove Eggs!

Hint: Look in Havendish Square, the Tearoom, the Ballroom, Fairy Tale Theater and the Fairy Coliseum.

Happy Hunting!

Did you know? Treetop Housewares Shop is selling eggs for you to dye and hide in your Fairy Home!

sillyDaysActivities.bodyCopy:
• Wear silly styles from Cassie's Costumes!

• Wear your Wacky Rainbow Wig and watch a comedy show in Fairy Tale Theater!

• Go on Silvermist's quest to get the key to Mermaid Grotto!

• Play silly pranks and see mermaids in Mermaid Grotto!

sillyDaysMermaid.bodyCopy:
How to see a real-life Mermaid:

1. Gather 3 pixies in the Grotto.

2. Everybody use the Music Note emote at the same time.

3. Behold a splashtastic sight. . .

mermaidParty.bodyCopy:
• Shop for splashtastic mermaid styles!

• Get the key to Mermaid Grotto from Silvermist's new quest!

• Enter Mermaid Grotto through Palm Tree Cove!

• Swim underwater in Fairy Tale Theater!

• Visit Kit for a ripple-rific Real World Quest!

gardenTeaPartTearoom.bodyCopy:
Follow these steps to brew tea and earn a special badge!

1. Buy Tea-Brewer Cap at Cassie's Costumes

2. Wear your Tea-Brewing Hat

3. Use the Teacup emote

4. The teapot will steam when it's ready!

gardenTeaPartSunflowerGully.bodyCopy:
Follow these steps to share tea and earn a special badge!

1. Buy Teatime Hat at Cassie's Costumes

2. Wear your Teatime Hat

3. Use the Teacup emote

4. Enjoy a cup o' tea with your pixie pals!

gardenTeaPartNeverfruitGrove.bodyCopy:
Follow these steps to share tea and earn a special badge!

1. Buy Teatime Hat at Cassie's Costumes

2. Wear your Teatime Hat

3. Use the Teacup emote

4. Enjoy a cup o' tea with your pixie pals!

gardenTeaPartPalmTreeCove.bodyCopy:
Follow these steps to cut the cake and earn a special badge!

1. Buy a Serving-Talent Hat at Cassie's Costumes

2. Wear your Serving-Talent Hat

3. Use the Cake emote

4. The cake slices are ready to be served!

troopRabbitFairyColiseum.bodyCopy:
1. Gather 5 pixies

2. Everybody wear a Troop Rabbit top (available at Cassie's Costumes.)

3. Everybody use the Troop Rabbit emote at the same time

4. A Troop Rabbit Silly Sweet will appear in your Pouch! (You can have up to 500 of these in your Pouch.)

troopButterflyPalmTreeCove.bodyCopy:
1. Gather 5 pixies

2. Everybody wear a Troop Butterfly top (available at Cassie's Costumes.)

3. Everybody use the Troop Butterfly emote at the same time

4. A Troop Butterfly Silly Sweet will appear in your Pouch! (You can have up to 500 of these in your Pouch.)

troopOtterDewdropVale.bodyCopy:
1. Gather 5 pixies

2. Everybody wear a Troop Otter top (available at Cassie's Costumes.)

3. Everybody use the Troop Otter emote at the same time

4. A Troop Otter Silly Sweet will appear in your Pouch! (You can have up to 500 of these in your Pouch.)

troopTurtleCottonpuff.bodyCopy:
1. Gather 5 pixies

2. Everybody wear a Troop Turtle top (available at Cassie's Costumes.)

3. Everybody use the Troop Turtle emote at the same time

4. A Troop Turtle Silly Sweet will appear in your Pouch! (You can have up to 500 of these in your Pouch.)

troopGlowwormChillyFalls.bodyCopy:
1. Gather 5 pixies

2. Everybody wear a Troop Glowworm top (available at Cassie's Costumes.)

3. Everybody use the Troop Glowworm emote at the same time

4. A Troop Glowworm Silly Sweet will appear in your Pouch! (You can have up to 500 of these in your Pouch.)

animalMothersDay2012Bunny.bodyCopy:
Earn your Bubbly Baby Bunny badge!

Click on the leaf buckets to wash the baby bunny.

Hint: Cover him in soapy bubbles from head to toe and make him giggle!

animalMothersDay2012Chipmunk.bodyCopy:
Wondering how to get your Cheerful Baby Chipmunk badge?

Click on the baby chipmunk to feed him a tasty treat.

Watch as his cheeks grow. . . and grow. . .

How many acorn chips can he stuff in there?!

animalMothersDay2012Owl.titleCopy: Sing the Baby Owl to Sleep!
animalMothersDay2012Owl.bodyCopy:
Follow these steps to earn your Blissful Baby Owl badge:


1. Buy a Stars Are Out Cap at Cassie's Costumes

2. Gather 3 pixies around the baby owl

3. Everybody wear the Stars Are Out Cap

4. Everybody use the Sing emote at the same time

5. Our lil feathered friend will fall fast asleep!

animalMothersDay2012Kitten.bodyCopy:
How cute is the Never Kitten?!


Click on the ball of yarn to play with her and earn your Curious Baby Kitten badge.


Hear that? She's saying, "You're pixie purr-fect!"

summerSplashParty.bodyCopy:
Summer Splash Party Checklist:


- Find the lucky fish hidden in Sunflower Gully to earn a badge.

- Dress in your favorite tropical wear and dance the hula!

- Check the calendar to find out when Tink is coming to the luau!
